name: ɴɪʜᴀʟダᴍᴜsɪᴄ
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

AUTO_LEAVING_ASSISTANT.description: If you want your assistant to leave all chats automatically after some time.

DURATION_LIMIT_MIN.description: Maximum duration that your bot can play in minutes.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

AUTO_DOWNLOADS_CLEAR.description: Fill True if you want to automatically clear the downloaded files after playing.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. You can use special characters bot ko jhaat farak ni padega

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.

PING_IMG_URL.description: The pic which will be shown when you give the /ping cmd to the bot.

START_IMG_URL.description: The pic which will be shown when you /start the bot in private.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Channel ki id mat daal dena bsdk.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Link of your support group ! Channel ki id mat daal dena bsdk.
